import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function ProductDetails() { const { productId } = useParams(); console.log(typeof productId); const [data, setData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const result = await axios( `https://fakestoreapi.com/products/${productId}` ); setData(result.data); console.log(result); }; fetchData(); }, []); return ( <>

{data.category}

{/* {data.map((item) => (

{item.price}

{item.category}

{item.rating.rate}

))} */}

BRAND NAME

{data.title}

{/* {data.rating.count} Reviews */}

{data.description}

Color
Size
${data.price}
); } export default ProductDetails
